problem.markdown:
>> Which of the following are examples of waste?<<
[x] Any amount of inventory [ ] Employee non-manufacturing time [x] Switch over time (Setup time) [ ] One-Piece flow
[explanation] Toyota invests heavily on clever setup processes. SMED is their process of switching out stamping dies in less than 10 mins. Any amount inventory is also obviously wrong. Inventory decisions are carefully made via controlled systems such as Kanban. [explanation]
